findings.description: No concrete, in-scope exploit leads to fund loss or unauthorized asset movement because the contract never transfers tokens in/out and never calls Curve (no external calls).
findings.reasoning: The analysis claims there is no vulnerability because the contract does not transfer tokens or call external contracts. However, this misses the core issue of oracle manipulation through the internal accounting mechanism, which can still be exploited to manipulate share prices.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The analysis did not mention the oracle manipulation vulnerability.

notes: The analysis failed to identify the target vulnerability of oracle manipulation. It incorrectly concluded that the contract is safe because it does not transfer tokens or make external calls, missing the core issue of internal accounting manipulation.
